job.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Matt Mahoney
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $170,000 - $225,000 per year
This is a well-funded computer software company that was founded in 2014 and raised a $133M Series C last year. They are an AI/ML focused startup servicing the Energy, Healthcare and Finance sectors by building industrial AI MVPs and POCs for larger corporations. They are looking for a Senior ML Engineer to build modern ML models for their products and work with their software team to deploy and maintain the models in production.
The ideal candidate has experience with
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
